name: Baratie- Food Delivery Website
description: Savor the flavors of innovation with Baratie, a React-powered food delivery website inspired by the iconic One Piece Baratie. Immerse yourself in a seamless culinary journey, where intuitive design meets technological prowess. Customize your orders effortlessly and relish the perfect blend of a modern interface and timeless gastronomic delights.

name: Design Portfolio Website
description: Check out my design portfolio! Made with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, spiced up with GSAP animations for that extra flair. Dive into a mix of creativity and tech, explore cool projects, and enjoy a smooth, eye-catching experience that showcases my design passion!

name: Nike Shoes design Website
description: This is a simple web page built using HTML, CSS, and GSAP for animations. This project aims to replicate a part of the Nike website's landing page.
